LanguageData.VFE_NoSilver: Not enough silver in stockpiles. You need to have at least {0} silver to build this prop
LanguageData.VFE_PropCostMultiplierDesc: Cost of prefabs that are bought with silver is calculated depending on their size, hit points, and cover. With this slider you can transform how much they'll cost. 0 disables all silver costs.
LanguageData.VFE_SilverReturnMultiplierDesc: When destroyed, props will return their purchase cost in silver. By default this will be 100% of this cost, but it can be reduced with this setting.
LanguageData.VPE_NeedsMatsDesc: This particular prop needs construction materials to be built instead of silver, and colonists must build it themselves
LanguageData.VFEPD_BuildPropsDesc: Open a menu to build props with a silver cost.
LanguageData.VFEPD_ResearchNeeded: Can't be built until {0} has been researched by the colony
LanguageData.VFEPD_MakeCopyDesc: Make a copy of this prop. This will require you to have the silver cost of the prop available in stockpiles.
